testcase.name: @BeforeTest before_test

failure.message: Server returned HTTP response code: 400 for URL: http://api.microsofttranslator.com/v2/Http.svc/Translate?text=my%3Bname+is%3Bajit%3Bsingh&from=en;&to=hi;
